overview:
Matthew Bird is an accredited expert in Online Public Relations, Digital Media, Financial Communications and Global Marketing. Over his 15 year career he’s responsible for the development of more than $400+ million in marketing and brand development revenues, rang the NASDAQ Closing Bell and worked with more than 1,000 companies including: Coca Cola, Orbitz, Yahoo!, Microsoft, Disney, Ramada, Toyota and Ford. In 2009 he was a feature speaker at MIT (MIT Sloan CFO Summit featured panelist) and has been seen on CNBC. Today Matt is the Founder and CEO of MUNCmedia, a global Featured News Update Network and worldwide leader in Retail & institutional investor targeted communications. Additionally he’s become an industry spokesperson for next generation online financial communications & social digital media education for IR & PR departments.

ABOUT MUNCMEDIA: MUNCmedia founded by Mr. Matthew Bird is the first Information Media Ad Network (tm) spanning over 800 global online newspapers, portals and trade publications reaching over 160 million north american unique consumers & investors worldwide based on advanced Semantic targeting. MUNC powers the “featured news updates” enabling companies to turn their news into featured content as a highly targeted priority alert “above the fold” - for IR, PR or product based outreach - over highly credible news publications like: NASDAQ.com, Furtune, NYtimes, iVillage, ask.com, CBS Interactive and hundreds more)

CURRENT SOLUTIONS INCLUDE: Crisis Communications, Public Relations, Investor Relations , Product Launches, Government & municipalities, Political Communications, Investor Network, Financial Communication , Drug & Pharma Edu, Proxy Education. He is also the founding partner of Retail Investor Conferences.com

Prior to founding MUNCmedia, Matthew Bird founded the interactive media agency Tribeca Digital and held Vice President and Director roles for New Media, Marketing and Digital Communications at BBDO Worldwide, Screaming Media and IGM.
